title: The Pawn
description: In a game of gods and witches, some pawns only want freedom.Created from the bones of Achilles, Achillia was destined for more than being a simple servant. Trained by Ares and tested by Apollo, she is sent to the mortal world to open the door preventing the gods from returning. She finds help in an unlikely ally, and only together can she free the gods; if they don't kill each other first.
author: Catherine  Banks
